EZChecklist Data.description: Access EZchecklistâ„¢ data to help users build solid habits by focusing on the most important activities for success in life and business. This tool enables tracking of daily routines, goal setting, and progress monitoring to facilitate personal and professional growth.
use_cases: Tracking user adherence to daily goals
limitations: Data older than 30 days might not be available

Query the User.description: Ask the user a specific question or get clarification. Requires a query to be specified.

WHOOP Data - Sleep.description: Retrieve detailed WHOOP sleep performance data, including sleep stages and efficiency, over a specified number of days.
limitations: Data older than 30 days might not be available

WHOOP Data - Cycles.description: Access WHOOP activity cycles, including strain and energy expenditure, over a specified number of days.
limitations: Data may be incomplete for interrupted cycles

WHOOP Data - Workout.description: Retrieve WHOOP workout data, including strain, heart rate metrics, and energy expenditure, over a specified number of days.

WHOOP Data - Recovery.description: Fetch WHOOP recovery scores, readiness metrics, and physiological data over a specified number of days.
limitations: Data might not account for external factors

Morning Journaling Exercises.description: Analyze or retrieve insights from morning journaling exercises over a specified number of days.
use_cases: Reflecting on user mindset over time
limitations: Insights depend on quality of entries

Read Personality Profile.description: Access the user's Big Five personality profile results
use_cases: Ensuring the user follows suggestions accurately
limitations: Personality data analysis may be subjective
May not cover all aspects of user personality
